title: Ever Since Playing On Windows 8.1 I've Been Ping Spiking
body: Tested playing league on 2 different laptops in a custom bot game for 10 minutes , the one running windows 7 constant 50 ping  the other running windows 8.1 ping spike every 3minutes 90 to around 400 max from 50.  I was wondering if a riot employee or anyone who understands the log files could help me understand why this is ive attached the network and r3dlog files from the windows 8.1 computer

replies.body: I'm on Telstra and rarely, if ever, have problems with the connection itself.

yeh i tried to install windows 7 but the laptop didnt come with a dvd drive so i used a usb one only problem was the usb connections are turned off during the boot screen (the laptop boots from the usb dvd drive but when the windows 7 loading screen comes up all usb devices are "disabled" during that process so makes it impossible) and to make it more impossible to install win7 on the laptop is its running a m2sata SSD so i cant just take it out like a normal HDD or SSD and install from another computer that has a dvd drive then connect it back to this one because my other computer isnt compatible for it which is really why i need help working around this on windows 8.1 :( i hate this OS with a passion

> windows 8.1

As Jamie Hyneman would say "Well there's your problem"
